definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[קער]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. qa9ura be deep, of well, qa9ara come to bottom of well, vessel, also make well deep; II. hollow out (Dozy); qa9iyrun deep, of well, bowl; Nab. [[קער]] hollow or carve out (Sachau:SB Ak, 1896, 1057); Syr. q9orto0, calyx, acorn-cup, well; Bondi:60 cp. Egypt. māqaār, bottom part of oven).
